subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ R. A. Dickey, who has thrown consecutive one-hitters, at first struggled to master the knuckleball, which he debuted for the Class AAA Oklahoma City RedHawks.
snippet: The Mets’ R. A. Dickey, who has thrown consecutive one-hitters, at first struggled to master the knuckleball, which he debuted for the Class AAA Oklahoma City RedHawks.
